name: map_image_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool navitime_maps.
Tool description: Get a JavaScript file or map as an image on web pages.
API description: Fetches a static map image for a specified location with given parameters such as width, height, center, and zoom level.

width.description:
Width of the map.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 999)

center.description: The center coordinates of the map (latitude,longitude).

zoom.description: The zoom level of the map. Must be between 6 and 19.

height.description:
Height of the map.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 999)

datum.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

coord_unit.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)
